New Records: Josh Inglis smashed a century with a strike rate over 200
Key Match Events: Cameron Green’s steady 36 from 29 provided a good anchor for partner Inglis
George Munsey smashed 19 from nine balls
Scotland opener George Munsey and Brandon McMullen were the only two to make double figures
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland suffered a 70-run defeat in the second T20 international and ultimately lost the three-match series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland opener George Munsey and Brandon McMullen – who top scored for the home side with 59 off 42 – were the only two to make double figures as Scotland were bowled out for 126 in reply
Others: Travis Head’s heroics on Wednesday, his duck on Friday brought number three batter Josh Inglis to the crease during the first over
